## What is Kudoo Copilot?

Kudoo Copilot is an intelligent chatbot that provides instant, expert guidance on ISO 27001 compliance and information security best practices. Available directly through our website at [https://kudoo.io](https://kudoo.io), this powerful tool offers organizations immediate access to compliance expertise without the need for extensive training or consulting services.

Unlike general-purpose AI assistants, Kudoo Copilot has been specifically trained on comprehensive ISO 27001 frameworks and policy templates, including:

- Information Security Policy
- Access Control Policy
- Data Classification and Handling Policy
- Risk Management Policy
- Business Continuity Policy
- Security Incident Management Policy
- Human Resources Security Policy
- Physical and Environmental Security Policy
- Network Security Policy
- Remote Working Policy
- Password Authentication Policy
- Logging and Monitoring Policy
- Asset Management Policy

This specialized knowledge allows Kudoo Copilot to provide detailed, accurate responses to your specific compliance questions in seconds, helping organizations of all sizes implement robust information security management systems without the steep learning curve.

## How to Interact with Kudoo Copilot

Using Kudoo Copilot is simple and intuitive. When you visit our website at [https://kudoo.io](https://kudoo.io), you'll notice the Copilot chat icon in the bottom right corner. Click to open the chat interface, and start asking questions in natural language.

Here are some examples of questions you can ask:

- "What should be included in a strong password policy?"
- "How do I classify data according to ISO 27001?"
- "What's the difference between preventive and detective controls?"
- "Can you help me draft an acceptable use policy?"
- "What evidence is needed for control A.8.9?"
- "How should we approach risk assessment for cloud services?"
- "What are the requirements for secure software development?"
- "How do we implement least privilege access control?"
- "What should our incident response procedure include?"

Kudoo Copilot understands context and can engage in multi-turn conversations, allowing you to ask follow-up questions or request more detailed explanations. The more specific your questions, the more tailored the responses will be to your needs.
